sentences.cn: 他甚至开始问我们有关非国大的问题.

sentences.cn: 骨髓恢复期, HFR +MFR首先出现或升高.

sentences.en: Receivables and prepayments include notes receivable , ac - counts receivable, other receivables, accounts prepaid anc prepaid expenses, etc.

sentences.en: That was for the ANC to decide.
sentences.cn: 这是由国民大会决定的.

sentences.en: The ANC are attacking rugby because it is the soft underbelly of South African sport.
sentences.cn: 橄榄球运动在“非国大”受到抨击，因为它是南非体育的软肋。

sentences.en: The ANC claimed the curfew gave licence to the police to hunt people as if they were animals.
sentences.cn: 非国大声称宵禁使得警察肆无忌惮地把人们当动物来抓捕。

sentences.en: The most famous researches include region encoding and Anc _ Desc _ B + algorithm, PBiTree encoding and VPJ algorithm.
sentences.cn: 著名的如区间编码以及对应的Anc_Desc_B+算法和PBiTree编码以及对应的算法.

sentences.en: The PC - NA laboling index in SRL group anc control group was ( 64.1±2.1 ) % and ( 80.8±1.0 ) % respectively ( P ＜0.05 ).
sentences.cn: 实验组大鼠PCNA指数为(64.1±2.1 ) %,较对照组 ( 80.8±1.0 ) %低,差异有统计学意义 ( P<0.05 ).

sentences.en: This sort of situation highlights a critical weakness in the ANC leadership: accountability.
sentences.cn: 这种情况突出了非国大领导层方面的极为严重的弱点: 有责任心.
在非国大里,她算是口无遮掩 吗 ?

sentences.en: You will choose to defend the constitution because that is all we have to protect all of our people from the ANC's power abuse.
sentences.cn: 你们将会选择捍卫宪法，因为只有那样我们才能保护人民，不让非国大滥用权力的行为殃及国民。
